nested.name: jsx3.app.Monitor
nested.text: A logging handler that can be instantiated per JSX application and displays logging messages in a separate browser window while an application is running.

nested.name: jsx3.app.Settings
nested.text: An object oriented interface onto the XML system settings format.

nested.name: jsx3.app.DOM
nested.text: Registers all DOM nodes in an instance of jsx3.app.Server and publishes related events.

nested.name: jsx3.app.Cache
nested.text: Provides cached access to XML and XSL data.

nested.name: jsx3.app.PropsBundle
nested.text: A subclass of jsx3.app.Properties that supports localized properties.

nested.name: jsx3.app.Server
nested.text: The controller of the JSX architecture.

nested.name: jsx3.app.Model
nested.text: The abstract base class that defines the JSX DOM.

nested.name: jsx3.app.Properties
nested.text: Represents a repository of dynamic properties.

nested.name: jsx3.app.UserSettings
nested.text: Read-Write per-User settings for a particular GI application (server).

nested.name: jsx3.app.AddIn
nested.text: A class that represents a JSX add-in.
